specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn - Yarn Effect > Slub Slub yarn is made with varying thicknesses, causing the fabric to have a bumpy texture. It adds a unique texture and character to the fabric's surface.
specifications.Dye Method: Space Dye Space dye is a technique where yarns are dyed with multiple colors at intervals along their length irregularly. This creates a unique multi-colored effect within a single yarn, resulting in fabrics with rich, variegated color patterns. Yarn Effect > Fancy Yarn Fancy yarns are specialty yarns, such as feather yarn, eyelash yarn, and novelty yarn, that add unique textures and visual effects to fabrics, making them stand out.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Dresses, Partywear
